DerivFunctor Class Reference

#include <PFunctors.h>

Inheritance diagram for DerivFunctor:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A functor which contains the derivative of the objective function to be minimized over certain DOFs of loop. Create a subclass of FunctFunctor to specify custom behavior.
